review: The first flaw is that it doesn't work with the USB port in the TV to power the unit, so you need to manage the long cable and connect it to a power outlet - which can be messy if you have a wall mounted TV. Second flaw is that the sound quality is very poor. I tried various settings but still the sound levels are very low on my SONY 720p LCD TV.

review: Getting the Twitch app was literally the reason I bought a FireTV Stick. As of 1/3/2015, the Twitch app is horrible! It doesn't even allow users to login with their Twitch account to view the (potentially less-popular) streams that they prefer. Users are stuck watching popular streams picked by someone else. Overall, FireTV Stick is nice, but I already had all the other app functionality on my TV before I bought the FireTV Stick. I had much higher hopes from Amazon. Unless/until Amazon significantly imrpoves their Twitch app, I'll consider my purchase as a big disappointment.
